description:
In its darkest hour, the fate of the Dokidoki Space lies on the few who dare oppose its cruelest foes. The end is in sight for Ramune and company.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 40 Tsudou! Nekketsu Power yo Eien ni
40集う! 熱血パワーよ永遠に
The Gathering of the 40! Be Forever, Hot Blood Power!
